column4: is there a counselling channel on this network for support cause I don't want to go back to Windows
yes
you're looking at it
really?  this is it?
this channel is the one that distresses me.
eh?
what's your problem?
my computer problem is the blanking screen, dpms, and the whole shooting match that is found in gxset.  my Windows problem is deeper than I care to probe; I thought I had it neatly packaged away.
this is under edgy right?
yeah
to solve the blanking screen issue I installed dapper instead of edgy
this issue is not present AT ALL in dapper
that's neozen mate
do you know if Feisty will have it?
and when I fired up the last beta image I had... it didn't do it... this... is good
since it really ticked me off in edgy
no worries
I think its going to be ok
cool we are of like needs then
a little less then a month
and we get new linux... with fewer issues
